definition: common factor/common divisor (of a math. expression)

sentences.english: Only the resultant matrix is needed to solve the greatest common factor of polynomials …
sentences.chinese: 该方法仅利用结矩阵便可求得多项式的最大公因式。

sentences.english: Factorization of this equation by trial and error is not possible.
sentences.chinese: 用试凑法对这个方程进行因式分解是不可能奏效的。

sentences.english: The algorithm relies on a QR factorization approach to the least-squares detection problem.
sentences.chinese: 该算法利用QR因式分解以解决最小二乘方探测问题。

sentences.english: Only the resultant matrix is needed to solve the greatest common factor of polynomials in this method.
sentences.chinese: 该方法仅利用结矩阵便可求得多项式的最大公因式。

sentences.english: And now a new method-equivalence change is given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 给出了另一种求最大公因式的方法，即等效变换法。

sentences.english: Thereby we break a new path to find the greatest common factor of polynomials .
sentences.chinese: 从而开辟了一条求解多项式最大公因式的新途径。

sentences.english: Two methods area) optimizing factorization to decrease the error of rounding operations.
sentences.chinese: 优化因式分解，以减少取整误差的引入。

sentences.english: Jacobian Matrix splitting and approximate factorization are used for solving obtained implicit difference equations.
sentences.chinese: 对差分方程之隐式部分利用了近似因式分解法。

sentences.english: A new method to solve the greatest common factor of one variable polynomials is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 给出一种求解一元多项式的最大公因式新方法。

definition: common factor/common divisor (of a math. expression)
surd (math.)/algebraic expression involving a square root or other irrationality
discriminant (e.g. b^2-4ac in the formula for the roots of a quadratic equation)
a nonnegative number (i.e. positive or zero)
reduced fraction (e.g. one half for three sixths)/to reduce a fraction by canceling common factors in the numerator and denominator
